headline.main: AXIS REPORTS IRAQIS OCCUPY OIL FIELDS; Radio Accounts Say Country Is Determined to Fight the British Forces HOPEFUL OF ARAB REVOLT Germans and Italians Look for Great Uprising in the Middle East

lead_paragraph: Radio reports broadcast from Axis stations and overheard yesterday in the United States asserted that Iraq had mobilized sections of the army, occupied the vital Mosul oil fields and moved virtually to the edge of war with Great Britain.
abstract: Axis hopes for united Arab revolt

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
